      • addTokenInstruction

        public void addTokenInstruction(TokenInstruction token)
        TokenInstructions are expanded (and not accepted at all in assert mode) as an argument for addInstruction method. Use this method if you intentionally want to collect TokenInstructions using assembly instruction buffer.
        Parameters:
        token -
